name: Lurker Legends
description:
Is a game made for Twitch streamers. 
  • Save your life and collect upgrades as you fight hordes of monsters spawned by your viewers.

  • Collect gold from chests to upgrade your damage, speed, health and more.

  • Viewers have a variety of monsters to spawn for free.

  • Special monsters can be spawned at the cost of a few bits.

  • To play Lurker Legends on your channel you have to install the Twitch Extension at: https://dashboard.twitch.tv/extensions/search?q=Lurker Legends.
